name: There Was A Day
description:
"There Was a Day" is a visual novel story about four anime girls making final preparations to celebrate Christmas.

Use left click to switch replicas in dialogue (in some parts of the story the controls are disabled and dialogue progresses automatically).

All art in-game was created using AI technology (Stable Diffusion).

Music by Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky - "The Nutcracker"
